name: Fails to create a deposit of a value less than zero
scenarioId: classpath:features/transaction/create_deposit:Fails to create a deposit of a value less than zero
methodName: Fails to create a deposit of a value less than zero

testSteps.description: Given the user has an active account in Tyny Bank
When the user makes a deposit of "-100.00"

userStory.narrative:
The deposit transaction is a credit to the account balance that is created when a user makes a deposit. The deposit
  must be a transaction with value greater than zero and it only needs the origin account (in this case is the account
  addressed to apply the deposit operation, not the account which money is being sent to).

  **As a** Tiny Bank client
  **I want to** deposit a value in a bank account
  **So that I can** credit value to my account balance

title: Fails to create a deposit of a value less than zero

rule.name: A deposit to a user account must be a value greater than zero
